title: Haixi, China
description: Haixi Mongol and Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture, locally also known as Qaidam Prefecture, is an autonomous prefecture occupying much of the northern tier of as well as part of the southwest Qinghai province, People's Republic of China.
theme:
MANKIND. Traces of human presence
on once virgin lands
